parameters.name: Value
parameters.description: File from which to load the spline data point values

title: ISimulationMotorFeatureData.LoadSplineData
description: Loads the spline data from the specified file for this motor feature.

parameters.name: Value
parameters.description: File from which to load the spline data point values

returns: True if the operation succeeds, false if it fails
remarks:
The file should contain one data point per line. The data point consists of two values:
Time
Value at that time
Use commas or spaces as separators between the values.
